EmailTemplate.description: Template for No Partner Assigned in the Area Case# 00533064
EmailTemplate.name: Template for No Partner Assigned in the Area
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Enquiry - {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We appreciate your interest in SunPower products.
SunPower sell products to customers via an Authorised Partner Network, and at this point in time we currently don't have a partner servicing your location. We'll keep your contact information for future reference and we will get back to you when we have a Partner available.
We hope to serve you better in the future.
Best Regards, {!Contact.OwnerFullName}| Customer Service Representative - Australia 1800.786.769 | customerservice.australia@sunpower.com
